[Authentic & Flavorful: Crafted with a traditional Gujarati recipe using natural yogurt chickpea flour and a unique spice blend for that true home-style taste,,
Healthy & Safe: Made with high-quality toxin-free ingredients and no artificial preservatives—perfect for the whole family,,

formdata.value:
xperience the authentic flavors of Gujarat with our traditional Gujarati Kadhi, crafted to bring you the true taste of home. This delightful yogurt-based curry is perfect for those who crave a harmonious blend of tangy and spicy flavors, typical of Gujarati cuisine.

Why Choose Our Gujarati Kadhi?

Authentic Recipe: Made using a time-tested recipe passed down through generations, our Kadhi retains the classic taste and aroma that makes it a staple in every Gujarati household.
High-Quality Ingredients: We use only the finest and freshest ingredients, including natural yogurt, chickpea flour (besan), and a unique blend of spices, ensuring every bite is a healthy and flavorful experience.
Toxin-Free Promise: True to Molimor’s commitment to health, our Gujarati Kadhi is free from any toxic chemicals and artificial preservatives, making it a safe choice for your family.
Easy to Prepare: Our Kadhi is simple to cook, making it perfect for a quick meal. Just add water, bring to a boil, and your delicious Kadhi is ready to enjoy!
Serving Suggestions
Pair it with steamed rice, rotis, or your favorite side dishes to make a wholesome meal that’s both nutritious and satisfying. Ideal for a light lunch or a comforting dinner, our Gujarati Kadhi brings a touch of home to your table.

Order Now
Don’t miss out on this delicious taste of Gujarat. Order our Gujarati Kadhi today and enjoy a warm, hearty meal that’s both healthy and easy to prepare.

100% Organic and Unfiltered
Packed with Nutrients
Supports Healthy Living
Full detailed description of the product.

Molimor have come up with multiple FMCG products with the concept of providing best & totally toxic chemicals free products to the world. Molimor is a company that specialises in manufacturing and exporting a variety of FMCG products. We have in-house processing plants which are based in Gujarat which is widely known as the heart of Indian FMCG market. All this products are cultivated adhering to the highest standards of quality control.

formdata.value: Molimor have come up with multiple FMCG products with the concept of providing best & totally toxic chemicals free products to the world. Molimor is a company that specialises in manufacturing and exporting a variety of FMCG products. We have in-house processing plants which are based in Gujarat which is widely known as the heart of Indian FMCG market. All this products are cultivated adhering to the highest standards of quality control.

Picking up the products offered by us over the regular ones is an effective decision for personal as well as planetary health. Our products are toxic chemicals free, rich in nutrition & sustainable in nature. With us, you will get access to a wide variety of best products to safe guard your family.

Molimor is a part of Shree Hari Group(SHG) Established over 20 years ago at Surat Gujarat, from where our global footprint stretches across few countries. We are the globally network chain group who has carved a niche in our field by adapting a Five-tier approach towards nation growth & health management. Molimor is the upcoming global company behind one of the fastest-growing health awareness communities which offers scientifically developed products & clinically proven plans to help achieve lifelong transformation in customers life.

At Molimor, we believe in offering products free from toxic chemicals, ensuring a safer and healthier experience for everyone. We understand the importance of nutrition and its impact on overall health. Therefore, our products are carefully developed to be rich in essential nutrients, promoting a balanced and nourishing lifestyle.
Our team builds the innovation process creating our surrounding Green Hub  by producing sustainable products in FMCG sector prioritizing health well-being of our every consumer.
We have infinite eye to make every family Rich in Health by delivering our high nutritious and protein products to generate Eco-Friendly valued chain.

To improve the quality of life of our customers, ensure that our products meet the quality & standards as set by our management, this are stringent and adhere to the quality acceptable over world for safe human consumption & we make sure to work on ethical principles that provide a healthy growth environment for our nation, customers & employees which lead to an all-round healthy living approach.
To help us realize our vision, we have five enduring values on which the business has been built.

Molimor is a prominent company specializing in manufacturing and exporting a wide range of FMCG (Fast-Moving Consumer Goods) products, with a strong foothold in the golden heart of the Indian FMCG market, Gujarat. Molimor is dedicated to providing the best products while prioritizing the health and well-being of our customers.

What sets Molimor apart is our commitment to sustainability. We recognize the importance of preserving our planet for future generations, so we strive to produce sustainable products. By choosing Molimor, you are not only prioritizing your health but also actively participating in environmental conservation.

At Molimor, we believe in offering products free from toxic chemicals, ensuring a safer and healthier experience for everyone. We understand the importance of nutrition and its impact on overall health. Therefore, our products are carefully developed to be rich in essential nutrients, promoting a balanced and nourishing lifestyle.

Molimor aims to safeguard your family's well-being with our diverse range of products. Whether it's household essentials or other FMCG products, we have covered you. Our stringent quality control measures ensure that every product meets the highest standards of excellence.
